TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed PackUriHelper extends System.Object
public ref class PackUriHelper abstract sealed

summary.span: 구성할 유틸리티 메서드를 제공하고 pack URI 개체를 구문 분석합니다.

span.span: Provides utility methods to compose and parse pack URI objects.

MemberSignature.Value: public static int ComparePackUri (Uri firstPackUri, Uri secondPackUri);
.method public static hidebysig int32 ComparePackUri(class System.Uri firstPackUri, class System.Uri secondPackUri) cil managed
Public Shared Function ComparePackUri (firstPackUri As Uri, secondPackUri As Uri) As Integer
public: static int ComparePackUri(Uri ^ firstPackUri, Uri ^ secondPackUri);

span.span: The first pack URI.
The second pack URI.

summary.span: 두 pack URI가 같은지 여부를 나타내는 값을 반환합니다.

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether two pack URIs are equivalent.

returns.span: 와 간의 관계를 나타내는 부호 있는 정수입니다.

span.span: A signed integer indicating the relationship between and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 두 `firstPackUri` 및 `secondPackUri` 는 `null`, 0을 반환 합니다.If both `firstPackUri` and `secondPackUri` are `null`, returns 0. Pack Uri를 비교 하는 경우는 null URI는 항상 null이 아닌 URI 보다 작은 합니다.When comparing pack URIs, a null URI is always less than a non-null URI. 사례에 대 한 여기서 `firstPackUri` 및 `secondPackUri` pack Uri를 절대 둘 다는 비교를 수행 합니다.For cases where `firstPackUri` and `secondPackUri` are both absolute pack URIs, performs the comparison.

span.span: Either or is not an absolute [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
-or-
Either or do not begin with a "pack://" scheme.

MemberSignature.Value: public static int ComparePartUri (Uri firstPartUri, Uri secondPartUri);
.method public static hidebysig int32 ComparePartUri(class System.Uri firstPartUri, class System.Uri secondPartUri) cil managed
Public Shared Function ComparePartUri (firstPartUri As Uri, secondPartUri As Uri) As Integer
public: static int ComparePartUri(Uri ^ firstPartUri, Uri ^ secondPartUri);

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the first .
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the second .

summary.span: 두 패키지 파트 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]가 같은지 여부를 나타내는 값을 반환합니다.

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether two package part [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] are equivalent.
A value that indicates the relationship between and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 두 `firstPartUri` 및 `secondPartUri` 는 `null`, 0을 반환 합니다.If both `firstPartUri` and `secondPartUri` are `null`, returns 0. 비교할 때 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)], null [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] 은 항상 null이 아닌 보다 작은 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]합니다.When comparing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)], a null [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] is always less than a non-null [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]. 사례에 대 한 여기서 `firstPartUri` 및 `secondPartUri` 가 모두 상대 Uri 비교를 수행 합니다.For cases where `firstPartUri` and `secondPartUri` are both relative URIs, performs the comparison.

exception.span: 또는 가 올바른 파트 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] 구문이 아닌 경우

span.span: or is not a valid part [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] syntax.
Creates a new pack URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 다음 표에서 설명에 대 한 샘플 사례는 메서드.The following table illustrates sample cases for the method. |`packageUri`|`partUri`|`fragment`|반환 된 pack URIReturned pack URI| |------------------|---------------|----------------|-----------------------| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page1.xaml/page1.xaml|#intro#intro|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page1.xaml#intropack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page1.xaml#intro| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page2.xaml/page2.xaml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page4.xaml/a/page4.xaml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%41/%61.xml/%41/%61.xml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%25XY.xml/%25XY.xml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page5.xaml/a/page5.xaml|#summary#summary|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page5.xaml#summarypack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page5.xaml#summary| |http://www.proseware.com/packages.aspx?pkg04|/page1.xaml/page1.xaml|#intro#intro|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fpkg04/page1.xaml#intropack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fpkg04/page1.xaml#intro| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|**null****null**|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abcftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc|/a/mydoc.xaml/a/mydoc.xaml|**null****null**|pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xamlpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xaml| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkgfile:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|/a/bar.xaml/a/bar.xaml|#xref#xref|pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml#xrefpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml#xref| Pack URI를 작성은 다중 단계로 구성 되어 있습니다.Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process. 슬래시 (/) 문자를 바꿀 pack URI를 만드는 단계 중 하나는 예를 들어는 `packageUri` 쉼표 (,) 사용 합니다.For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,). 문자열 변환 하 고 pack Uri 형성 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 부록 A.4 "문자열 변환 예" 및 "Pack URI 작성" B.3 부록에서 다운로드할 수 있는 Open Packaging Conventions 사양에 [사양 다운로드 라이선스 및](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)합니다.For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

MemberSignature.Value: public static Uri Create (Uri packageUri);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Uri Create(class System.Uri packageUri) cil managed
Public Shared Function Create (packageUri As Uri) As Uri
public: static Uri ^ Create(Uri ^ packageUri);

span.span: The URI of the referenced .

summary.span: 패키지를 가리키는 새 Pack URI를 만듭니다.

span.span: Creates a new pack URI that points to a package.

returns.span: 지정된 에서 참조하는 의 Pack URI입니다.

span.span: The pack URI for the referenced by the given .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `packageUri` 로 지정할 수 없습니다. `null` 이거나 비어 있습니다.`packageUri` may not be specified as `null` or empty. 다음 표에서 설명에 대 한 샘플 사례 합니다.The following table illustrates sample cases for . |`packageUri`|반환 된 pack URIReturned pack URI| |------------------|-----------------------| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abcftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc|pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abcpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkgfile:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkgpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg| Pack URI를 작성은 다중 단계로 구성 되어 있습니다.Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process. 슬래시 (/) 문자를 바꿀 pack URI를 만드는 단계 중 하나는 예를 들어는 `packageUri` 쉼표 (,) 사용 합니다.For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,). 문자열 변환 하 고 pack Uri 형성 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 부록 A.4 "문자열 변환 예" 및 "Pack URI 작성" B.3 부록에서 다운로드할 수 있는 Open Packaging Conventions 사양에 [사양 다운로드 라이선스 및](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)합니다.For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). ## Examples 사용 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 pack 패키지를 참조 하는 URI를 정의 하는 메서드.The following example shows how to use the method to define a pack URI that references a package. [!code-csharp[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)] [!code-vb[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)]

The pack URI of the given .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `packageUri` null 또는 빈으로 지정할 수 있습니다.`packageUri` may not be specified as null or empty. 경우 `partUri` 은 `null`, 반환 된 pack URI 패키지를 가리킵니다.If `partUri` is `null`, the returned pack URI points to the package. 다음 표에서 설명에 대 한 샘플 사례는 메서드.The following table illustrates sample cases for the method. |`packageUri`|`partUri`|반환 된 pack URIReturned pack URI| |------------------|---------------|-----------------------| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page2.xaml/page2.xaml|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page4.xaml/a/page4.xaml|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%41/%61.xml/%41/%61.xml|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%25XY.xml/%25XY.xml|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abcftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc|/a/mydoc.xaml/a/mydoc.xaml|pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xamlpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xaml| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkgfile:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|/a/bar.xaml/a/bar.xaml|pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xamlpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml| Pack URI를 작성은 다중 단계로 구성 되어 있습니다.Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process. 슬래시 (/) 문자를 바꿀 pack URI를 만드는 단계 중 하나는 예를 들어는 `packageUri` 쉼표 (,) 사용 합니다.For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,). 문자열 변환 하 고 pack Uri 형성 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 부록 A.4 "문자열 변환 예" 및 "Pack URI 작성" B.3 부록에서 다운로드할 수 있는 Open Packaging Conventions 사양에 [사양 다운로드 라이선스 및](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)합니다.For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). ## Examples 사용 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 pack 패키지를 참조 하는 URI를 정의 하는 메서드.The following example shows how to use the method to define a pack URI that references a package. [!code-csharp[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)] [!code-vb[RightsManagedPackagePublish#RmPkgPubGetFixDoc](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RightsManagedPackagePublish/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#rmpkgpubgetfixdoc)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static Uri Create (Uri packageUri, Uri partUri, string fragment);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Uri Create(class System.Uri packageUri, class System.Uri partUri, string fragment) cil managed
Public Shared Function Create (packageUri As Uri, partUri As Uri, fragment As String) As Uri
public: static Uri ^ Create(Uri ^ packageUri, Uri ^ partUri, System::String ^ fragment);

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the .
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the in the package.

param.name: fragment
param.span: 패키지 파트 내에서 요소를 식별하는 "#" 참조입니다.

span.span: A "#" reference identifying an element within the package part.

summary.span: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], 패키지 파트의 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] 및 추가할 “#” 조각이 지정된 Pack URI를 만듭니다.

span.span: Creates a pack URI given a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of a part in the package, and a "#" fragment to append.

returns.span: 지정된 패키지, 패키지 파트 및 조각을 식별하는 Pack URI입니다.

span.span: The pack URI that identifies the specified package, package part, and fragment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `packageUri` 로 지정할 수 없습니다. `null` 이거나 비어 있습니다.`packageUri` may not be specified as `null` or empty. 경우 `partUri` 은 `null`, 반환 된 pack URI 패키지를 가리킵니다.If `partUri` is `null`, the returned pack URI points to the package. `fragment` 빈 문자열을 될 수 없지만로 지정할 수 있습니다 `null`합니다.`fragment` cannot be an empty string but can be specified as `null`. 으로 지정 되지 않은 경우 `null`, `fragment` 문자열 '#' 문자로 시작 해야 합니다.When not specified as `null`, the `fragment` string must begin with a '#' character. 자세한 내용은의 구문에 대 한 `fragment` 참조, 3.5 단원에 "조각" 참조의 [RFC 3986](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3986.txt)합니다.For more information of the syntax of `fragment` references, see Section 3.5 "Fragment" of [RFC 3986](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3986.txt). 다음 표에서 설명에 대 한 샘플 사례는 메서드.The following table illustrates sample cases for the method. |`packageUri`|`partUri`|`fragment`|반환 된 pack URIReturned pack URI| |------------------|---------------|----------------|-----------------------| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page1.xaml/page1.xaml|#intro#intro|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page1.xaml#intropack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page1.xaml#intro| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page2.xaml/page2.xaml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page4.xaml/a/page4.xaml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%41/%61.xml/%41/%61.xml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%25XY.xml/%25XY.xml|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xmlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page5.xaml/a/page5.xaml|#summary#summary|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page5.xaml#summarypack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page5.xaml#summary| |http://www.proseware.com/packages.aspx?pkg04|/page1.xaml/page1.xaml|#intro#intro|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fpkg04/page1.xaml#intropack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fpkg04/page1.xaml#intro| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|**null****null**|**null****null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abcftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc|/a/mydoc.xaml/a/mydoc.xaml|**null****null**|pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xamlpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xaml| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkgfile:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|/a/bar.xaml/a/bar.xaml|#xref#xref|pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml#xrefpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml#xref| Pack URI를 작성은 다중 단계로 구성 되어 있습니다.Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process. 슬래시 (/) 문자를 바꿀 pack URI를 만드는 단계 중 하나는 예를 들어는 `packageUri` 쉼표 (,) 사용 합니다.For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,). 문자열 변환 하 고 pack Uri 형성 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 부록 A.4 "문자열 변환 예" 및 "Pack URI 작성" B.3 부록에서 다운로드할 수 있는 Open Packaging Conventions 사양에 [사양 다운로드 라이선스 및](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)합니다.For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). ## Examples 사용 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 pack 패키지를 참조 하는 URI를 정의 하는 메서드.The following example shows how to use the method to define a pack URI that references a package. MemberSignature.Value: public static Uri CreatePartUri (Uri partUri);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Uri CreatePartUri(class System.Uri partUri) cil managed
Public Shared Function CreatePartUri (partUri As Uri) As Uri
public: static Uri ^ CreatePartUri(Uri ^ partUri);

span.span: The URI of the within the package.
Creates a formatted URI.
A formatted URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] 의 에서 항상 참조는 루트입니다.The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of a is always referenced from the root. 반환 된 URI는 절대 경로 항상로 시작 하는 "/"에 정의 된 구문을 준수 하 고는 [열려 패키징 Conventions 사양](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)합니다.The returned URI is an absolute path that always starts with "/" and conforms to the syntax defined in the [Open Packaging Conventions Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). 다음 표에서 설명에 대 한 샘플 사례 합니다.The following table illustrates sample cases for . |`partUri`|반환 된 파트 URIReturned Part URI| |---------------|-----------------------| |picture1.jpgpicture1.jpg|/picture1.jpg/picture1.jpg| |/picture2.jpg/picture2.jpg|/picture2.jpg/picture2.jpg| |a/mydoc.xamla/mydoc.xaml|/a/mydoc.xaml/a/mydoc.xaml| |/b/bar.xaml/b/bar.xaml|/b/bar.xaml/b/bar.xaml| ## Examples 사용 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 메서드 정의 대 한 상대 Uri를 요소입니다.The following example shows how to use the method to define relative URIs for elements. [!code-csharp[PackageWrite#PackageWriteCreatePartUri](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PackageWrite/CSharp/PackageWrite.cs#packagewritecreateparturi)] [!code-vb[PackageWrite#PackageWriteCreatePartUri](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PackageWrite/visualbasic/packagewrite.vb#packagewritecreateparturi)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 다음 표에서 설명에 대 한 샘플 사례 합니다.The following table illustrates sample cases for . |`packUri`|반환된 되는Returned Package URI| |---------------|--------------------------| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xaml|http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.xyz| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xaml|http://www.proseware.com/packages.aspx?mypackage| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg|http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg| |pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpgpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpg|ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abcftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc| |pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xamlpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml|file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkgfile:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|

span.span: The pack URI from which to return the URI.

summary.span: 지정된 pack URI 내에서 의 URI를 반환합니다.

span.span: The URI of the in the given , or if points to a package instead of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 반환 된 URI는 패키지 루트 이며 절대 경로 시작 하 고 "/"에 정의 된 구문을 준수 하 고는 [열려 패키징 Conventions 사양](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)합니다.The returned URI is relative to the package root and is an absolute path that always starts with "/" and conforms to the syntax defined in the [Open Packaging Conventions Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). 다음 표에서 설명에 대 한 샘플 사례 합니다.The following table illustrates sample cases for . |`packUri`|반환 된 파트 URIReturned Part URI| |---------------|-----------------------| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xaml|/a/mydoc.xaml/a/mydoc.xaml| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xamlpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xaml|/a/bar.xaml/a/bar.xaml| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkgpack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg|nullnull| |pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpgpack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpg|/a/picture.jpg/a/picture.jpg| |pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xamlpack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml|/a/bar.xaml/a/bar.xaml|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 관계 파트의 속성 중 하나를 식별 해야 합니다는 ("/") 또는 아닌는 합니다.The property of a relationship part must identify either the ("/") or a that is not a . 예를 들어 경우 패키지 파트 "/ files/document.xaml" 관계 파트의 원본 소유자가 "/ files/_rels/document.xaml.rels" 호출, 와 `relationshipPartUri` 의 매개 변수 "/ files/_rels/document.xaml.rels"는 반환의 "/ files/document.xaml"입니다.For example, if the package part "/files/document.xaml" is the source owner of the relationship part "/files/_rels/document.xaml.rels", calling with the `relationshipPartUri` parameter of "/files/_rels/document.xaml.rels" returns the of "/files/document.xaml".
